text: Egha Jonatan dagɨar davarir kurar kamɨn ghua uan dafarimningɨn ua bagha suigha, suemningɨn iruemɨn ghuanadi moghɨn an bɨra ghuavanadi, ezɨ an namakam kamaghɨra an gɨn ghuavanabo. Ezɨ Jonatan Filistian maba mɨsozima, me daighirima, an namakam an gɨn iza mɨdorozir sabamɨn me aghori me bar ariaghiri.
